abstract: China Everbright Bank may raise 20 billion yuan ($2.95 billion) in an initial public offering of yuan-denominated shares in China, Bloomberg News said, citing a report in Century Weekly magazine.
snippet: China Everbright Bank may raise 20 billion yuan ($2.95 billion) in an initial public offering of yuan-denominated shares in China, Bloomberg News said, citing a report in Century Weekly magazine.
lead_paragraph: China Everbright Bank may raise 20 billion yuan ($2.95 billion) in an initial public offering of yuan-denominated shares in China, Bloomberg News said, citing a report in Century Weekly magazine.

headline.main: China Everbright May Raise $2.95 Billion in I.P.O.
